about_the_game:
Welcome to Panic in Store!


As a supermarket employee, you will be required to go from store to store, carrying out short missions for the store chain that employs you. You will have to put the right cardboards (cereal, game, fruit, etc.) in the right aisles (cereal, games, fruit, etc.) while paying attention to the obstacles that will get in your way in this game casual but nervous.

Be a good employee!


Advance from level to level, obtaining more and more stars in order to show the world your skills as a supermarket employee!
Watch out for customers and random events that are there to get in your way.

Beware of the storm!


Random events may occur during your missions: slippery puddles, inverted movements, increased number of customers in the store, level plunged into darkness. You will need to understand these events and how to defuse them, without losing sight of your main objective.

A unique apartment!


As you complete your missions during the various levels of the game, you will unlock furniture and accessories to personalize your apartment.

A fabulous look!


Become a true fashion victim by unlocking various clothes and outfits as you progress to make your games even more fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: You play a supermarket employee who must (in each level and within a given time) put the right boxes in the right departments. But be careful! Customers will come after you to waste your time!
